title: Auto-approve new user registrations and update success messaging

requirements.text: Modify the user registration backend in backend/main.mo to set the user's approval status to 'Approved' by default when creating a new user account, eliminating the need for manual admin approval

quotes: Set User Status to 'Approved' by default: When a new user registers, their account should be automatically approved. No manual action should be required from the admin.

acceptanceCriteria: New user registrations automatically receive 'Approved' status in the backend users HashMap
The approved field is set to true during user creation
No admin action is required to activate new user accounts

requirements.text: Update the registration success message in frontend/src/pages/Register.tsx to display 'Registration Successful! You can now log in' instead of any pending approval message

quotes: Remove the 'Pending Approval' message: Instead, show a 'Registration Successful! You can now log in' message.

acceptanceCriteria: Success toast or message displays 'Registration Successful! You can now log in' after successful registration
No pending approval messaging is shown to the user
Message appears immediately after registration completes

requirements.text: Ensure the registration flow in frontend/src/pages/Register.tsx automatically redirects users to the /login page immediately after successful registration

quotes: Auto-Redirect: After clicking Register, the user should be automatically redirected to the Login page.

acceptanceCriteria: After successful registration, user is automatically navigated to /login route
Redirect occurs after the success message is displayed
No manual navigation by user is required

constraints: Maintain existing user data structure in backend/main.mo
Do not modify the admin panel's user management functionality
Preserve all existing user registration fields (username, WhatsApp number, group number, email, password, referral code)
nonGoals: Changing the admin panel user approval interface
Modifying any other authentication or login flows
Altering the referral system or user dashboard access logic
